title: Essay on Criticism - lines suggest that an author

content.question: Lines 41-42 suggest that an author

choices.label: accomplishes more than he or she can imagine
cannot anticipate how a work will affect readers
cannot create what he or she cannot conceive
need not write to please a critic

content.answer: cannot create what he or she cannot conceive

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
